title: What's Reggie Hiding? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.19.19
description:
Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock at http://games.robinhood.com

Get 15% off your first purchase at http://thirdlove.com/games

Tim thinks he's figured out what Reggie is hiding in his gift from Nintendo developer Retro, and Greg's got ideas for Xbox's future.

Time Stamps - 
00:05:06 - Housekeeping
Vancouver Meet and Greet - May 4th - kindafunny.com/events
The Roper Report   -
00:06:25 - Retro and Reggie Teasing us
00:15:53 - Nintendo Stock Soars on China News
00:18:40 - Twitch still killing, but YouTube is gaining
00:24:02 - Out today
00:30:23 -  Robinhood
00:31:21 -  Thirdlove
Reader mail   -
00:32:38 - “What if Xbox knows full well that the SAD isn't going to move the needle…” - Tory Thompson
00:42:43 - “Do you think in this new generation, you will be able to buy new PlayStation games once and they will work on both consoles?” - Matt Council
00:52:14 - Squad Up: Shifty Fellow - PS4 - ShiftyFellow - Dreams
00:54:04 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Greg & Andrea
Tuesday - Greg & David Jagneaux
Wednesday - Greg & Whitta
Thursday - Greg & Andrea
Friday - Greg & Tim
